title: Shift For Brains
description: Zombie epidemics are bad for business.And I thought $5 + your brain was a reasonable cover charge.But you know… supply and demand…And functioning brains are in short supply these days.When it came to hunting vampires, I was second to none.Vampires are intelligent. It also means they have predictable patterns. Figure out their habits and I could take care of most vamps and be back in time for breakfast.They’re also image-conscious.But zombies are unpredictable. They run on pure instinct.They couldn’t care less about public relations.Their numbers are growing by the hour.Since I’m an elemental, they can’t smell me. It gives me an advantage that human hunters don’t have.But will it be enough?If I can’t stop them it will mean the end of humanity, the end of the world as we know it.Go up and click ‘Read for Free’ or ‘Buy Now’ and find out if Nyx, or “Nicky,” can stop a zombie apocalypse.Shift For Brains is the fourth book in the Legend of Nyx series. If you enjoy shifter urban fantasy, vampire urban fantasy, with snarky and unlikely heroes, then you’ll enjoy this vampire hunter series. Fans of Michael Anderle, Shayne Silvers, or Linsey Hall will love Theophilus Monroe’s Legend of Nyx series. Shift For Brains is a one-of-a-kind shapeshifting LGBT adventure where a trans heroine must confront her inner demons if she hopes to vanquish the latest supernatural threat.
author: Theophilus Monroe
